mapper.select: SELECT COMMON_CODE ,CODE_NAME ,DIVISION , REG_ID ,REG_DATE ,MOD_ID ,MOD_DATE,REF FROM COM c WHERE DIVISION = #{division}

SELECT EMP_IMG, EMP_NO, EMP_POS, EMP_DEPT, EMP_PW, EMP_NAME, EMP_GENDER, EMP_HIREDATE, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_PHONE, EMP_BIRTH, EMP_AUTH, EMP_STATUS, EMP_RETIREDATE, EMP_POSTCODE, EMP_ADDRESS1, EMP_ADDRESS2, EMP_ADDRESS3, REG_ID, REG_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE FROM GEO.EMP WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND EMP_PW = #{emp_pw} AND EMP_STATUS IN ('ST001', 'ST003')

SELECT EMP_NO, EMP_POS, EMP_DEPT, EMP_PW, EMP_NAME, EMP_GENDER, EMP_HIREDATE, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_PHONE, EMP_BIRTH, EMP_POSTCODE, EMP_ADDRESS1, EMP_ADDRESS2, EMP_ADDRESS3, EMP_AUTH, EMP_STATUS, EMP_RETIREDATE, REG_ID, REG_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE FROM GEO.EMP WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND EMP_NAME = #{emp_name} AND EMP_EMAIL = #{emp_email}
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NO, FILE_ONAME, FILE_SNAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_TYPE, FILE_RANK, FILE_DEL_YN, REG_ID, REG_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE FROM GEO."FILE" WHERE FILE_NO = #{file_no}

SELECT EMP_NO , EMP.EMP_NAME AS EMP_NAME, POS.CODE_NAME AS EMP_POS, DEPT.CODE_NAME AS EMP_DEPT, EMP_IMG FROM EMP INNER JOIN COM POS ON EMP.EMP_POS = POS.COMMON_CODE AND POS.DIVISION = '직급' INNER JOIN COM DEPT ON EMP.EMP_DEPT = DEPT.COMMON_CODE AND DEPT.DIVISION = '부서' WHERE EMP.EMP_NO = #{emp_no}

SELECT BO_NO, EMP_NO , BO_STATUS, BO_TITLE, BO_CONTENT, BO_REGDATE, BO_LIKE_COUNT, BO_VIEW_COUNT, EMP_NAME FROM (SELECT BO_NO,b.EMP_NO,BO_STATUS, BO_TITLE,BO_CONTENT , BO_REGDATE,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKER l WHERE l.BO_NO=b.BO_NO) AS BO_LIKE_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIEW_COUNT v WHERE v.BO_NO = b.BO_NO) AS BO_VIEW_COUNT, BO_DEL_YN ,b.MOD_ID ,b.MOD_DATE ,e.EMP_NAME AS EMP_NAME FROM BO b INNER JOIN EMP e ON b.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO WHERE BO_STATUS ='announcements' AND BO_DEL_YN ='N' ORDER BY BO_REGDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT APD_NO, EMP_NO , APD_CON, APD_STEP ,APD_STATUS ,APD_DAYS , APD_HALF_YN , APD_FORM , APD_CLEAR_DATE ,APD_TEMP_YN , REG_ID , REG_DATE , MOD_ID , MOD_DATE FROM (SELECT APD_NO, EMP.EMP_NAME AS EMP_NO , APD_CON, APD_STEP ,APD_STATUS ,APD_DAYS , APD_HALF_YN ,c.CODE_NAME AS APD_FORM , APD_CLEAR_DATE ,APD_TEMP_YN , ad.REG_ID, ad.REG_DATE , ad.MOD_ID , ad.MOD_DATE FROM AP_DOCU ad INNER JOIN EMP ON ad.EMP_NO = EMP.EMP_NO INNER JOIN COM c ON ad.APD_FORM = c.COMMON_CODE WHERE APD_NO IN (SELECT APD_NO FROM AP_LINE al WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no}) AND APD_TEMP_YN = 'N' ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AP_DOCU WHERE APD_NO IN (SELECT APD_NO FROM AP_LINE al WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no}) AND APD_TEMP_YN = 'N' AND APD_STATUS = #{apd_status} AND EXTRACT (MONTH FROM AP_DOCU.APD_CLEAR_DATE) = #{month}
SELECT CAL_NO , EMP_NO , CAL_TITLE , CAL_CONTENT , CAL_START , CAL_STOP FROM CAL WHERE CAL_DEL_YN = 'N' AND CAL_OPEN_YN = 'Y' AND EMP_NO = #{emp_no}

SELECT NOTI_NO , EMP.EMP_NAME AS EMP_NO , NOTI_STATUS , NOTI_CONTENT , NOTI_DATE , NOTI_READ_YN, ORIGIN_NO FROM (SELECT NOTI_NO , EMP_NO , NOTI_STATUS , NOTI_CONTENT , NOTI_DATE , NOTI_READ_YN, ORIGIN_NO FROM NOTI WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND NOTI_READ_YN = 'N' ORDER BY NOTI_DATE DESC) NOTI JOIN EMP ON NOTI.EMP_NO = EMP.EMP_NO WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTI WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND NOTI_READ_YN = 'N'
SELECT COALESCE( (SELECT NOTI_READ_YN FROM NOTI WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND ORIGIN_NO = #{origin_no}), 'Y') AS NOTI_READ_YN FROM dual
